news.title: ‘A step-change’: tech firms battle for undersea dominance with submarine drones
news.summary: Navies around the world are racing to add autonomous submarines. The UK’s Royal Navy is planning a fleet of underwater uncrewed vehicles (UUVs) Australia has committed to spending $1.7bn (£1.3bn) on ‘Ghost Shark’ submarines.

news.title: More than 1,000 Amazon workers warn rapid AI rollout threatens jobs and climate
news.summary: More than 1,000 Amazon employees have signed an open letter expressing ‘serious concerns’ about AI development. Workers say the firm’s ‘warp-speed’ approach fuels pressure, layoffs and rising emissions.

news.title: One in 10 UK parents say their child has been blackmailed online, NSPCC finds
news.summary: One in 10 UK parents say their child has been blackmailed online. Harms include threats to release intimate pictures. NSPCC warns against parents sharing photos or details of children online.

news.title: How to avoid bad Black Friday laptop deals – and some of the best UK offers for 2025
news.summary: Black Friday deals have started, and if you’ve been on the lookout for a good price on a new laptop, then this could be your lucky day. But with so many websites being shouty about their Black Friday offers, the best buys aren’t always easy to spot. So before you splash the cash, it might pay to do some research – and look closely at the specification. Buy the right laptop today and you can look forward to many years of joyful productivity

news.title: The best Black Friday TV deals in the UK – and how to avoid a bad one
news.summary: We've rounded up the best Black Friday TV deals for every budget. From 50in OLEDs and small smart TVs to top-rated brands. Do you really need to buy a new TV?

news.title: After a teddy bear talked about kink, AI watchdogs are warning parents against smart toys
news.summary: Advocates are fighting against the $16.7bn global smart-toy market. They decry surveillance and a lack of regulation. The trend has prompted calls for increased testing of such products.

news.title: The best Black Friday 2025 deals in the UK on the products we love: coffee machines, board games and heated airers
news.summary: Black Friday has long since ceased to be a mere ‘day’ Products that have been discounted throughout November have been given even more tempting offers. There are still plenty of savings available to shop and, crucially, there’s lots of time left to mull over your decision.

news.title: My family’s excitement about Outer Worlds 2 was short-lived | Dominik Diamond
news.summary: The original Outer Worlds dazzled our eyeballs with its art nouveau palette. It charmed our ears with witty dialogue, sucking us into a classic mystery-unravelling story. My wife did not play The Outer Worlds, because none of those worlds featured Crash Bandicoot.
